resources.string:
Terms Of Use
You may use this app for personal, non-commercial applications and services including educational and research purposes.

Disclaimer
The author disclaims all responsibility for any loss or damage arising from the use of this app. Data availability and accuracy can not be guaranteed.

How soon after a race or qualification will data become available?
Usually in 3 ~ 6 hrs.

How do you change the year of the season?
Selecting the title of the application at the top will display dialog of choice.
